data.name: CodePaste_UnableToDeleteSnippet
data.value: We tried to delete the snippet you posted but couldn't. Try visiting CodePaste.NET manually to see if you have better luck than us.

data.name: CodePaste_UnableToLoginMessage
data.value: Unfortunately, we can't establish a session with CodePaste.NET... so we can't post your snippet.

data.name: ContextButtonIcon
data.value: ..\Resources\ContextButtonIcon.ico;System.Drawing.Icon, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a

data.name: ContextButtonIconMask
data.value: ..\Resources\ContextButtonIcon1.ico;System.Drawing.Icon, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a

data.name: ContextMenu_TweetButton
data.value: Tweet This!

data.name: ContextMenu_TweetButtonDescription
data.value: Sends the selected code snippet to CodePaste.NET and tweets a link to the snippet.

data.name: Dialog_GetTwitterPinFailed
data.value: For some reason, we couldn't communicate correctly with Twitter. Try again later. (For details on what happened, check the DevExpress message log.)

data.name: Dialog_GetTwitterPinMessage
data.value: We need to send you to Twitter to get a PIN and authorize this app. It'll ask you to allow/deny the app - click "allow" and then copy the PIN it gives and paste it into the settings here. Are you ready to go?

data.name: Dialog_GetTwitterPinSuccess
data.value: You've successfully authorized CR_CodeTweet to communicate with Twitter! Awesome!

data.name: Dialog_GetTwitterPinTitle
data.value: Getting a Twitter PIN

data.name: Dialog_TweetCanceledMessage
data.value: You canceled the tweet but the snippet got posted. Would you like to delete the snippet?

data.name: Dialog_TweetCanceledTitle
data.value: Delete the snippet?

data.name: Dialog_TweetFailedDeleteSnippetMessage
data.value: The tweet failed but the snippet got posted. Do you want to delete the snippet?

data.name: Dialog_TweetFailedMessage
data.value: It doesn't look like we could post your code snippet and/or get that thing to Twitter.

data.name: Dialog_TweetFailedTitle
data.value: Failed to Post/Tweet

data.name: Dialog_UnexpectedException
data.value: Something happened that we weren't expecting. We're gonna have to just bail for now, but you're free to try again if you want. We put some detail in the DXCore event log, but here's the short version:

data.name: Exception_TweetFailedMessage
data.value: The operation to post a code snippet and tweet a link failed.

data.name: Options_CodePasteNotConfigured
data.value: Your CodePaste.NET credentials don't appear to be configured. Please make sure you have specified the username and address with which you log into CodePaste.NET.

data.name: Options_NotConfiguredTitle
data.value: CodeTweet Options Not Configured

data.name: Options_TwitterNotConfigured
data.value: You don't appear to have authorized CodeTweet to use Twitter. Please make sure you get an OAuth PIN from Twitter and configure CodeTweet. You can get a PIN from the CodeTweet options page.

data.name: Options_WantToConfigure
data.value: Would you like to visit the options page to check your settings?

data.name: Progress_ConnectedToCodePaste
data.value: The flying monkeys are ready to take your code to CodePaste.NET.

data.name: Progress_ConnectingToCodePaste
data.value: Prepping the flying monkeys for a trip to CodePaste.NET...

data.name: Progress_DeletedSnippet
data.value: The monkeys successfully nuked that snippet!

data.name: Progress_DeleteSnippetFailed
data.value: The monkeys couldn't nuke your snippet.

data.name: Progress_DeletingSnippet
data.value: Sending the monkeys back to CodePaste.NET to delete the snippet...

data.name: Progress_PostedSnippet
data.value: The monkeys delivered the snippet to CodePaste.NET.

data.name: Progress_UnableToGetCodePasteSession
data.value: CodePaste.NET is denying access to the monkeys...

data.name: Twitter_AuthorizationFailed
data.value: Authorization with Twitter failed.

data.name: Twitter_ServerError
data.value: There was an unexpected error in the Twitter service.

data.name: CodePaste_UnableToPostSnippet
data.value: CodePaste.NET just wasn't accepting that snippet. Logged in fine but couldn't post. Weird. Make sure you're not trying to post a duplicate snippet - CodePaste checks for that.

data.name: Dialog_SnippetDeletedMessage
data.value: The snippet was successfully deleted.

data.name: Dialog_SnippetDeletedTitle
data.value: Snippet deleted!

data.name: Dialog_TweetSentMessage
data.value: Your snippet was successfully tweeted.

data.name: Dialog_TweetSentTitle
data.value: Tweet sent!

data.name: Progress_PostedTweet
data.value: The ninjas posted your tweet!

data.name: Progress_PostingTweet
data.value: Handing the tweet over to the Twitter ninjas...

data.name: Progress_TweetFailed
data.value: The ninjas refuse to post that tweet. Are they busy fighting a whale?

data.name: Progress_UnableToPostSnippet
data.value: CodePaste.NET refused the offering of the snippet...
